frontmatter.title: How to Add a Camera to your OBS
frontmatter.metaTitle: How to Add a Camera to your OBS
frontmatter.metaDesc: How to Add a Camera Source in OBS

pageProps.content:
1. Select an existing scene or create a new scene. See the support article "How to Create an OBS Scene"
2. Select the "+" in the Sources section, and select the "Video Capture Device.

   ![](/blog-assets/BrowserSource.png)
3. Enter a name and select OK.

   ![](/blog-assets/VideoSource.png)
4. Select the camera device, and select OK.

   ![](/blog-assets/SelectDevice.png)
5. The Video will be shown

   ![](/blog-assets/NeedToBeResized.png)
6. Drag and resize the video to fit the Reactive Embed.

   ![](/blog-assets/croppedOBSSource.png)
